remarks: Closure of isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` when ` -. X .<_ W ` . (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihval.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.d $e |- D = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.c $e |- C = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihval.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihlsscpre $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) e. S ) $.
